column2: an A.M. Eatery////I like Snooze's theme however usually
column4: you're kind of unattended as there are so many people the waitstaff have to deal with. I do really appreciate their "self-service" style of billing
column5: wish more restaurants would follow their lead! Overall
column6: Snooze's atmosphere is the worst part about it (wait times
column7: bit higher price for brunch food) but it makes up for it with the food!
